title: Nilavu Thoongum Neram Lyrics Kunguma Chimil
stanzas:
<div>
Nilavu Thoongum Neram Lyrics Kunguma Chimil

Nilavu thoogum neram
ninaivu thoongidaathu.
iravu thoonginaalum
uravu thoongidaathu

idhu oru thodarkathai
thinam thinam valarpirai
nilavu thoongum neram

naangu kannil indru
oru kaatchi aanathe.
vaanam kaatru boomi
ivai saatchi aanathe.

naan unai paarthadhu
poorva jenma bandham.
neenda naal ninaivile
vaazhum indha sondham

naan ini nee
nee ini naan
vazhvom vaa kanne.

Nilavu thoogum neram
ninaivu thoongidaathu.
iravu thoonginaalum
uravu thoongidaathu

idhu oru thodarkathai
thinam thinam valarpirai
nilavu thoongum neram

geethai pola kadhal
miga punithamaanathu.
kodhai nenjil aadum
indha siluvai pondrathu.

vazhvilum thalvilum
vilagidaatha nesam
vaalibam thedralaai
endrum ingu veesum

yaen mayakkam
yaen thayakkam
kannaa vaa ingae.

Nilavu thoogum neram
ninaivu thoongidaathu.
iravu thoonginaalum
uravu thoongidaathu

idhu oru thodarkathai
thinam thinam valarpirai
